title: Corporal Punishment - 8 Lashes
description: What starts as a chance reunion between college acquaintances quickly evolves into an epic tale of love, submission, and fantasy. Lena thinks she is happy with her life as an elementary school teacher. One day, overcome with frustration, she loses her temper and spanks one of her students. The boy's father is her old crush Derek, and when Derek demonstrates on her his own techniques for corporal punishment, she is drawn into Derek's world of sex and submission. Lena has no idea how far Derek's fantasies will push her, but she desires nothing more in the world than to fulfill his every desire.These stories are also available separately in the Kindle store. Includes Corporal Punishment through Corporal Punishment 8.
author: Constance Daley
